sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Home Depot ( HD ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 3.9%.
Year to date, Home Depot registers a 11.2% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Boeing ( BA ), trading down 0.8%.
Boeing is showing a gain of 18.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Verizon ( VZ ), trading down 0.7%, and JP Morgan ( JPM ), trading up 2.4% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
